data.title: Is Jo Koy gay? Here is the truth about the comedian's sexuality
data.meta_description: Is Jo Koy gay? The question is quite popular online as people wonder whether the famous comedian has been gay. Find out more about Jo Koy’s sexual orientation.
data.text:
Everyone is waiting for Jo Koy to “come out”, but will he? First things first – are the stories about his sexuality true? Koy has been in the entertainment industry for over two decades, and fans have seen him transition from an amateur to an expert. However, his sexuality has been scrutinised lately with rumours of being gay. So, is Jo Koy gay?

Some news is sometimes so bizarre that it seems someone threw it out to see how it works. Imagine being labelled with a different sexuality online with accusations from every corner. It is a big test for famous personalities torn between staying silent or stating their stance.

But does talking make things better? As they say, actions speak louder than words; for Jo Koy, you can quickly tell his sexuality. So, where does the beloved comedian fall? What is Jo Koy's sexuality?

Who is Jo Koy?

Have you watched E!’s late-night show Chelsea Lately? Joy Koy was a frequent panellist on the show. His sentiments were always great to look forward to. However, that is different from how he gained the limelight.

Joseph Glenn Herbert Sr., known professionally as Jo Koy, is a renowned American stand-up comedian and actor. He has been active in the entertainment industry since 1989 and has incredible works in various genres in his niche.

Jo Koy was born to a white father stationed in the United States Air Force in the Philippines. He grew up in Tacoma, Washington, but moved to Las Vegas after completing his high school education.

Interestingly, Jo's stage name comes from a nickname he was given by his family while growing up. His aunt once called him to go to dinner, shouting, "Jo Ko, eat!" and the name stuck.

Jo Koy has had massive success as a comedian, making his big debut in 1994 at a comedy club in Las Vegas. Since then, Jo has performed in numerous shows and appeared in TV series.

Is Jo Koy gay?

Jo has been straight his entire life. There is no substantive evidence to prove that he is gay, including his coming out to state. On top of that, Jo has had various public relationships with women and has even been married. So, where did the gay rumours come from?

While on Chelsea Handler’s late-night show, she made fun of Jo, stating he was gay. Immediately, people started to wonder whether it could be true. It appears that it was just a joke at the spur of the moment. Jo has even dated Chelsea, who joked about him being gay.

What happened with Jo Koy and Chelsea Handler?

Jo Koy and Chelsea Handler started officially dating in August 2021. They first met through a mutual friend (Jon Lovitz), and their friendship gradually became a romance. Jo and Chelsea made their relationship public in September and shared numerous lovely memories.

However, in July 2022, almost a year after they started their new life together, Jo Koy and Chelsea ended the relationship because they disagreed. Handler announced the sad news.

In anticipation of celebrating our first year together, Jo and I recorded this video early, but as many of you have noticed, it is with a heavy heart that we have decided to take a break from our relationship right now...

Chelsea opened up the primary reason for their break up in a podcast with Brooke Shields, Now What.

I won't change how I act to make you feel better. I won't do that, and I had to leave a relationship I thought would last forever. So that was hard.

Despite their breaking up, Jo Koy and Chelsea are still good friends and often talk about each other lives from time to time.

Does Jo Koy have a wife?

Jo Koy was married to Filipino-American singer Angie King. They fell in love in the mid-1990s and married in Nevada in February 2003. However, as the years progressed, the couple grew distant, and they decided to separate on the tenth anniversary of their wedding in 2013.

Does Jo Koy have children?

Jo Koy and his ex-wife, Angie, had their first child, Joseph Glenn Herbert Jr., on April 21, 2003. Despite his divorce, Jo Koy loves his son immensely and is close to him. He takes him to many of his shows and even makes fun of him.

Who is Jo Koy dating?

Who is Jo Koy's partner right now? Since breaking up with Chelsea Handler, Jo Koy has not publicised any of his relationships, if he has had one.

Wrapping up

The question, “Is Jo Koy gay?” is quite bizarre as the comedian has never been inclined to the sexuality status. He has dated various people over the years, the most recent being Chelsea Handler. He is not in any public relationship at the moment.
